name: BREAKING PONG
description:
Little project of  PONG for class made by Alba Roncero Serrano.

Simple PONG with IA, more difficulty for IA and second player.

Player as Walter White.

Enemy or second player as Hank Schrader.

Pause provided by Gus.

And if you draw, Saul is happy to tell you something.

Happy cooking!
